Scaling and centering of vectors

Source: R/transform.R
scale_vec.Rd

A wrapper around base::scale() that returns a vector instead of a matrix.

Usage

scale_vec(x, center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)

Examples

# using base::scale()
scale(0:4)
#>            [,1]
#> [1,] -1.2649111
#> [2,] -0.6324555
#> [3,]  0.0000000
#> [4,]  0.6324555
#> [5,]  1.2649111
#> attr(,"scaled:center")
#> [1] 2
#> attr(,"scaled:scale")
#> [1] 1.581139

# using scale_vec()
scale_vec(0:4)
#> [1] -1.2649111 -0.6324555  0.0000000  0.6324555  1.2649111
